%mdk-data-line={33}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8b23924457e6274a87d329639fcfb54f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={36}
\hat {p} = N_{hits}/N_{attempts}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={43}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8d62e469fb30ed435a668eb5c035b1f6]%mdk
{\mdcolor{\#586E75}$y_i$}\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={44}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[584a81dbf5bf6aa737ba43567ad6307b]%mdk
{\mdcolor{\#586E75}$n_i$}\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={44}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6bcef6e9f519f9ded072f177f57f6e32]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={47}
\begin{aligned}
y_i &\sim Binomial(n_i, p_i) \\
p_i &\sim Beta(\nu_1, \nu_2) \\
\nu_1, \nu_2 &\sim lognormal(0, 1)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={83}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f897d61b7969e43a53cd11176b5dcd2e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{aligned}
y_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\ 
\mu_i &= \alpha_0 + \alpha_{block[i]} + \beta x_i \\ 
\alpha_k &\sim Normal(0, \sigma_{\alpha}), \text{for $k$ in } \{1,\cdots ,N_{blocks}\} \\ 
\alpha_0 &\sim Normal(0, 1) \\
\beta &\sim Normal(0, 0.3) \\
\sigma, \sigma_{block} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={154}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6b623bcf78099c519f69e9dbba46fbf2]%mdk
{\mdcolor{\#586E75}$L_i$}\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={154}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[aeac1e45b2a6b9fdf2924f90bbbb52f2]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={157}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_{actor[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={165}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6b623bcf78099c519f69e9dbba46fbf2]%mdk
{\mdcolor{\#586E75}$L_i$}\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={165}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0c067e7d88535bd6ec7b0ac63ced3905]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={168}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_{actor[i]} + \gamma_{block[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1773721e30e3c5656c062ea3117e16fb]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={177}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_{actor[i]} + \gamma_{block[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\beta_j &\sim Normal(0, 0.5)\text{, for } j = 1..4 \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[46843eb80eb434d4501c8a220ce76d02]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={187}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_{actor[i]} + \gamma_{block[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\beta_j &\sim Normal(0, 0.5)\text{, for } j = 1..4 \\
\alpha_j &\sim Normal(\alpha_0, \sigma_{\alpha})\text{, for } j = 1..7 \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[78669eb13fbf088c3b8a9a3d55a9a3c5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={198}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &=  \alpha_{actor[i]} + \gamma_{block[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\beta_j &\sim Normal(0, 0.5)\text{, for } j = 1..4 \\
\alpha_j &\sim Normal(\alpha_0, \sigma_{\alpha})\text{, for } j = 1..7 \\
\gamma_j &\sim Normal(0, \sigma_{\gamma})\text{, for } j = 1..6 \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[813f15f8070c812b1d1f6d00fba4f8fc]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={210}
\begin{aligned}
L_i & \sim Bernoulli(p_i) \\ 
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_0 + \alpha_{actor[i]} + \gamma_{block[i]} + \beta_{treatment[i]} \\
\beta_j &\sim Normal(0, 0.5)\text{, for } j = 1..4 \\
\alpha_j &\sim Normal(\alpha_0, \sigma_{\alpha})\text{, for } j = 1..7 \\
\gamma_j &\sim Normal(0, \sigma_{\gamma})\text{, for } j = 1..6 \\
\alpha_0 &\sim Normal(0, 1.5) \\
\sigma_{\alpha} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\sigma_{\gamma} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={275}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8a5db48ad34f0271a8fd526f0f1809ce]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={281}
\begin{aligned}
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_{actor[i]}  \\
\alpha_j &\sim Normal(\alpha_0, \sigma_{\alpha})\text{, for } j = 1..7 \\
\alpha_0 &\sim Normal(0, 1.5) \\
\sigma_{\alpha} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7ccaec10ea83f691336451fc3076df69]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={292}
\begin{aligned}
logit(p_i) &= \alpha_0 + \tilde \alpha_{actor[i]} * \sigma_{\alpha} \\
\tilde \alpha_j &\sim Normal(0, 1)\text{, for } j = 1..7 \\
\alpha_0 &\sim Normal(0, 1.5) \\
\sigma_{\alpha} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[61f2e03d24c1695f37c2b02d17db7c3f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={323}
\begin{aligned}
y_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\ 
\mu_i &= \alpha_0 + \alpha_{block[i]} + (\beta_0 + \beta_{block[i]}) x_i \\ 
\alpha_k &\sim Normal(0, \sigma_{\alpha}), \text{for $k$ in } \{1,\cdots ,N_{blocks}\} \\
\beta_k &\sim Normal(0, \sigma_{\beta}), \text{for $k$ in } \{1,\cdots ,N_{blocks}\} \\ 
\alpha_0, \beta_0 &\sim Normal(0, 1) \\
\beta &\sim Normal(0, 0.3) \\
\sigma, \sigma_{block} &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
